document:
${versionNumber} ${versionType} ~
~${versionNumber} ${versionType} \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t CONDITIONS OF COMMUNITY SUPERVISION ~CONDITIONS OF COMMUNITY SUPERVISION
~For: ~${Name}_____________________
~Cause: ~${Cause}_____________________
${comments}
THE STATE OF TEXAS IN THE ${court}__________________ DISTRICT COURT OF
VS. HARRIS COUNTY, TEXAS
${Name} CAUSE NUMBER ${Cause}_____________________
The Court hereby takes notice that on the ${juvDay} day of ${juvMonth}, ${juvYear}__________________, ${Name}_____________________, was placed on ${JuvTermTimePeriod}___________ of supervision in accordance with the Texas Family Code Section 54.04. The Court takes further notice that pursuant to and in accordance with Texas Family Code Section 54.051, a hearing was conducted in the ${juvCourt}__________________ Judicial District Court ("the Juvenile Court") before the Defendant's Eighteenth birthday, and it was ordered that the community supervision of ${Name}__________________, defendant, be transferred to an adult District Court of Harris County, Texas, to serve the remainder of the probation term under Art. 42.12, Texas Code of Criminal Procedure. The Court takes further notice that a hearing to determine the need for sex offender registration of a juvenile, pursuant to Texas code of Criminal Procedure, Art. 62.13 was held by the juvenile Court.
On this the ${dopDayOrdinal} day of ${dopMonth}, ${dopYear}__________________, you are granted ${supervisionLengthNum}___________ community supervision for the felony offense of ${offense}__________________ in accordance with section 3 of Article 42.12, Texas Code of Criminal Procedure, in the ${sentencingCourt}__________________ District Court of Harris County, Texas, by the Honorable ${origJudgeFLName}_____________________ Judge Presiding. It is the order of this Court that you abide by the following Conditions of Community Supervision:
_foreach_(eachCondition ${conditions} 'even' 'odd')
${eachCondition.conditionNumber} ${eachCondition.conditionName}
_foreach_(subCondition ${eachCondition.subConditions} 'even' 'odd')
${subCondition.subConditionNumber} ${subCondition.subConditionName}
_endfor_
_endfor_
${versionNumber} ${versionType}CONDITIONS OF COMMUNITY SUPERVISION
For: ${Name}_____________________
Cause: ${Cause}_____________________
${comments}
I understand that under the laws of this State, the Court shall determine the terms and conditions of Community Supervision, and may alter or modify said conditions during the period of Community Supervision. I further understand that failure to abide by these Conditions of Community Supervision may result in the revocation of Community Supervision or an adjudication of guilt.
Community Supervision expires the ${probationEndDay}___________ day of ${probationEndMonth}___________ A.D. ${probationEndYear}___________
________________________________________
${signedByDefendantDate} ___________
${name} _________________________________, DEFENDANT
DATE
\t\t\t\t\tSigned this ${signedDay}___________________ day of ${signedMonth}__________________________ A.D. ${signedYear}_________________
______________________________________________________________________
${signedByFLName} ________________________, PRESIDING JUDGE
_______________________________________
${signedDate} ___________________
${cloName} ________________________, CLO/CSO OFFICER
DATE
SPN:
${spn}__________________\t
PLEA:
${plea}__________________\t
Defendant's Right Thumbprint
_if_ (${summaryofChanges} notEmpty)
${summaryofChanges}
_endif_
